responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "FB319D6746A0E35DCCBEAE9FE87D6488", "Our scouts reported a strange, ancient-looking runic pillar deep within those ruins, near where The Gilded seem to congregate. It reacted when touched, but they couldn\'t make sense of it. If you have the time and the inclination, see if you can figure it out. Any scrap of knowledge about these runes or their creators could be vital. But the Gilded plate is your priority.")
name: ANV_FTUE_0007_Commander_GrettaIronhand_11_Response
